code: import"./BlogPreview.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{createLinkFromDateAndTitle}from"../../util/Helperfunctions";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var BlogPreview=function BlogPreview(props){var subtitle=props.subtitle||"";var trimmedSubtitle=subtitle.length>120?subtitle.substring(0,120).trim()+"...":subtitle;var link="/blog/"+createLinkFromDateAndTitle(props.date,props.title);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-preview-kachel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:link,className:"div-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"blog-preview-image",src:props.picture,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"blog-preview-title",children:props.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"blog-preview-subtitle",children:trimmedSubtitle||""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"blog-preview-signature",children:"".concat(props.author," / ").concat(props.date.toDateString())})]})});};export default BlogPreview;
